Title: Excellent commune member
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The young woman is a "Six Good Commune Member" (六好社員), according to the ribbon on her award, bottom left. The "Six Goods" are good political ideology, good discipline, good in collective labor, good care for public property, good unity and mutual assistance, good diligence and thrift.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
